body_html:
@soumith I already did exactly that several times :) It didn't help.

What eventually did the trick was this:

conda upgrade conda
conda upgrade anaconda

This somehow forced mkl 2018.0.1 h19d6760_4 to be installed. And pytorch 0.3.0 py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.0.3h37a80b5_4

What eventually did the trick was this:
conda upgrade conda
conda upgrade anaconda

body:
@soumith I already did exactly that several times :) It didn't help.

What eventually did the trick was this:
```
conda upgrade conda
conda upgrade anaconda
```
This somehow forced `mkl 2018.0.1 h19d6760_4` to be installed. And `pytorch 0.3.0 py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.0.3h37a80b5_4`
